2020 Social Impact Report17Putting  
People FirstAt its core, banking is a service business.  
It’s particularly true for commercial banking and, especially, as it’s 
practiced by Signature Bank. We believe that our client-centric focus 
and ability to deliver a holistic, single-point-of-contact experience is 
unparalleled. Intense client loyalty and twenty years of uninterrupted 
growth have been the result of Signature Bank’s hard work, and this  
has only convinced us to double down on what we think makes us 
so special. But in order to provide and maintain such a high level of 
client service, an institution must have a talented, engaged, dedicated, 
productive - and happy - workforce.Putting People First
“Even as we grow, we remain committed to a culture  
of compassion, respect, and trust. This has never 
changed. They are the pillars of our institution and 
extend to all constituents associated with the Bank.  
At Signature Bank, we bring the human factor to  
all we do. Our culture is one of treating people the way 
you want to be treated. This is a top-down mentality.  
Joseph J. DePaolo
Co-Founder, President and Chief Executive Officer
